name: bulbasaur
desc: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

name: ivysaur
desc: The bulb on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.

name: venusaur
desc: The flower on its back catches the sun's rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.

name: charmander
desc: The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.

name: charmeleon
desc: Tough fights could excite this POKéMON. When excited, it may blow out bluish- white flames.

name: charizard
desc: When expelling a blast of super hot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

name: squirtle
desc: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

name: wartortle
desc: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

name: blastoise
desc: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.

name: caterpie
desc: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: metapod
desc: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.

name: butterfree
desc: Its wings, covered with poisonous powders, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.

name: weedle
desc: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

name: kakuna
desc: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

name: beedrill
desc: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

name: pidgey
desc: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

name: pidgeotto
desc: This POKéMON is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

name: pidgeot
desc: This POKéMON flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

name: rattata
desc: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: raticate
desc: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

name: spearow
desc: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

name: fearow
desc: A POKéMON that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

name: ekans
desc: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

name: arbok
desc: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: pikachu
desc: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

name: raichu
desc: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

name: sandshrew
desc: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

name: sandslash
desc: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

name: nidoran f
desc: A mild-mannered POKéMON that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.

name: nidorina
desc: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

name: nidoqueen
desc: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this POKéMON. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.

name: nidoran m
desc: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

name: nidorino
desc: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: nidoking
desc: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.

name: clefairy
desc: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

name: clefable
desc: They appear to be very protective of their own world. It is a kind of fairy, rarely seen by people.

name: vulpix
desc: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

name: ninetales
desc: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this POKéMON.

name: jigglypuff
desc: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

name: wigglytuff
desc: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

name: zubat
desc: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: golbat
desc: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.

name: oddish
desc: It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.

name: gloom
desc: Smells incredibly foul! However, around 1 out of 1,000 people enjoy sniffing its nose- bending stink.

name: vileplume
desc: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: paras
desc: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

name: parasect
desc: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.

name: venonat
desc: Its large eyes act as radars. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

name: venomoth
desc: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: diglett
desc: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: dugtrio
desc: A team of triplets that can burrow over 60 MPH. Due to this, some people think it's an earthquake.

name: meowth
desc: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: persian
desc: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.

name: psyduck
desc: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.

name: golduck
desc: Its slim and long limbs end in broad flippers. They are used for swim­ ming gracefully in lakes.

name: mankey
desc: An agile POKéMON that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

name: primeape
desc: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

name: growlithe
desc: A POKéMON with a friendly nature. However, it will bark fiercely at anything invading its territory.

name: arcanine
desc: A legendary POKé­ MON in China. Many people are charmed by its grace and beauty while running.

name: poliwag
desc: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.

name: poliwhirl
desc: Under attack, it uses its belly  spiral to put the foe to sleep. It then makes its escape.

name: poliwrath
desc: Swims powerfully using all the muscles in its body. It can even overtake champion swimmers.

name: abra
desc: Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.

name: kadabra
desc: Many odd things happen if this POKéMON is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backwards.

name: alakazam
desc: A POKéMON that can memorize anything. It never forgets what it learns-- that's why this POKéMON is smart.

name: machop
desc: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

name: machoke
desc: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this POKéMON would be unstoppable.

name: machamp
desc: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this POKéMON fires off awesome punches.

name: bellsprout
desc: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny insects with its vines and devours them.

name: weepinbell
desc: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.

name: victreebel
desc: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: tentacool
desc: It can sometimes be found all dry and shriveled up on a beach. Toss it back into the sea to revive it.

name: tentacruel
desc: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.

name: geodude
desc: Commonly found near mountain trails, etc. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

name: graveler
desc: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

name: golem
desc: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it's exposed to air.

name: ponyta
desc: Capable of jumping incredibly high. Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb the impact of a hard landing.

name: rapidash
desc: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: slowpoke
desc: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

name: slowbro
desc: Lives lazily by the sea. If the SHELLDER on its tail comes off, it becomes a SLOWPOKE again.

name: magnemite
desc: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electro­ magnetic waves.

name: magneton
desc: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the tem­ perature by 3.6F degrees within 3,300 feet.

name: farfetchd
desc: Lives where reedy plants grow. They are rarely seen, so it's thought their numbers are decreasing.

name: doduo
desc: Its short wings make flying dif­ ficult. Instead, this POKéMON runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: dodrio
desc: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

name: seel
desc: Loves freezing cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid cli­ mate of around 14F degrees.

name: dewgong
desc: Its entire body is a snowy-white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

name: grimer
desc: Made of hardened sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won't grow in its path.

name: muk
desc: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration, it lost its sense of smell.

name: shellder
desc: The shell can withstand any attack. However, when it is open, the tender body is exposed.

name: cloyster
desc: For protection, it uses its harder- than-diamonds shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

name: gastly
desc: Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It has no real shape as it appears to be made of a gas.

name: haunter
desc: By licking, it saps the victim's life. It causes shaking that won't stop until the victim's demise.

name: gengar
desc: A GENGAR is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.

name: onix
desc: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by DIGLETTs.

name: drowzee
desc: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.

name: hypno
desc: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

name: krabby
desc: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.

name: kingler
desc: One claw grew massively and as hard as steel. It has 10,000-HP strength. However, it is too heavy.

name: voltorb
desc: It is said to camouflage itself as a POKé BALL. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

name: electrode
desc: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

name: exeggcute
desc: The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be 6 heads for it to maintain balance.

name: exeggutor
desc: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the 3 heads thinks about whatever it likes.

name: cubone
desc: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

name: marowak
desc: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: hitmonlee
desc: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on im­ pact and destroys its enemy.

name: hitmonchan
desc: Punches in cork­ screw fashion. It can punch its way through a concrete wall in the same way as a drill.

name: lickitung
desc: Its tongue spans almost 7 feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.

name: koffing
desc: In hot places, its internal gases could expand and explode without any warning. Be very careful!

name: weezing
desc: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.

name: rhyhorn
desc: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

name: rhydon
desc: Walks on its hind legs. Shows signs of intelligence. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.

name: chansey
desc: A gentle and kind­ hearted POKéMON that shares its nutritious eggs if it sees an injured POKéMON.

name: tangela
desc: Its identity is obscured by masses of thick, blue vines. The vines are said to never stop growing.

name: kangaskhan
desc: Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won't run from any fight to keep its young protected.

name: horsea
desc: If it senses any danger, it will vigorously spray water or a special type of ink from its mouth.

name: seadra
desc: Touching the back fin causes numb­ ness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

name: goldeen
desc: When it is time for them to lay eggs, they can be seen swimming up rivers and falls in large groups.

name: seaking
desc: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming power­ fully up rivers and creeks.

name: staryu
desc: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

name: starmie
desc: The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in 7 colors.

name: mr mime
desc: Always practices its pantomime act. It makes enemies believe something exists that really doesn't.

name: scyther
desc: Leaps out of tall grass and slices prey with its scythes. The move­ ment looks like that of a ninja.

name: jynx
desc: Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if it were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.

name: electabuzz
desc: If a major power outage occurs, it is certain that this POKéMON has eaten electricity at a power plant.

name: magmar
desc: Born in an active volcano. Its body is always cloaked in flames, so it looks like a big ball of fire.

name: pinsir
desc: Grips its prey in its pincers and squeezes hard! It can't move if it's cold, so it lives in warm places.

name: tauros
desc: A rowdy POKéMON with a lot of stamina. Once running, it won't stop until it hits something.

name: magikarp
desc: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers and shallow puddles.

name: gyarados
desc: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

name: lapras
desc: A gentle soul that can read the minds of people. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.

name: ditto
desc: When it spots an enemy, its body transfigures into an almost perfect copy of its oppo­ nent.

name: eevee
desc: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways. There are only a few alive.

name: vaporeon
desc: Its cell structure is similar to water molecules. It will melt away and become invis­ ible in water.

name: jolteon
desc: A sensitive POKé­ MON that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.

name: flareon
desc: It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales, then blows out fire that is over 3,000F degrees.

name: porygon
desc: The only POKéMON people anticipate can fly into space. None has managed the feat yet, however.

name: omanyte
desc: An ancient POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It swims by cleverly twisting its 10 tentacles about.

name: omastar
desc: Sharp beaks ring its mouth. Its shell was too big for it to move freely, so it became extinct.

name: kabuto
desc: A POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It uses the eyes on its back while hiding on the sea floor.

name: kabutops
desc: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

name: aerodactyl
desc: A ferocious, pre­ historic POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

name: snorlax
desc: Will eat anything, even if the food happens to be a little moldy. It never gets an upset stomach.

name: articuno
desc: A legendary bird POKéMON. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.

name: zapdos
desc: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: moltres
desc: A legendary bird POKéMON. As it flaps its flaming wings, even the night sky will turn red.

name: dratini
desc: The existence of this mythical POKéMON was only recently confirmed by a fisherman who caught one.

name: dragonair
desc: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

name: dragonite
desc: It is said that this POKéMON lives somewhere in the sea and that it flies. However, it is only a rumor.

name: mewtwo
desc: Its DNA is almost the same as MEW's. However, its size and disposition are vastly dif­ ferent.

name: mew
desc: When viewed through a micro­ scope, this POKéMON's short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.

name: chikorita
desc: It loves to bask in the sunlight. It uses the leaf on its head to seek out warm places.

name: bayleef
desc: The scent that wafts from the leaves on its neck causes anyone who smells it to become energetic.

name: meganium
desc: Anyone who stands beside it becomes refreshed, just as if they were relaxing in a sunny forest.

name: cyndaquil
desc: È riservato per natura. Se viene spaventato, le fiamme sul suo dorso bruciano ardentemente.

name: quilava
desc: Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes.

name: typhlosion
desc: When heat from its body causes the air around it to shimmer, this is a sign that it is ready to battle.

name: totodile
desc: This rough critter chomps at any moving object it sees. Turning your back on it is not recommended.

name: croconaw
desc: The tips of its fangs are slanted backward. Once those fangs clamp down, the prey has no hope of escape.

name: feraligatr
desc: Although it has a massive body, its powerful hind legs enable it to move quickly, even on the ground.

name: sentret
desc: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.

name: furret
desc: It lives in narrow burrows that fit its slim body. The deeper the nests go, the more maze­ like they become.

name: hoothoot
desc: It begins to hoot at the same time every day. Some trainers use them in place of clocks.

name: noctowl
desc: Its extremely soft feathers make no sound in flight. It silently sneaks up on prey without being detected.

name: ledyba
desc: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.

name: ledian
desc: In the daytime when it gets warm, it curls up inside a big leaf and drifts off into a deep slumber.

name: spinarak
desc: If prey becomes ensnared in its nest of spun string, it waits motionlessly until it becomes dark.

name: ariados
desc: A single strand of a special string is endlessly spun out of its rear. The string leads back to its nest.

name: crobat
desc: As a result of its pursuit of faster, yet more silent flight, a new set of wings grew on its hind legs.

name: chinchou
desc: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communi­ cation is its constantly flash­ ing lights.

name: lanturn
desc: This POKéMON uses the bright part of its body, which changed from a dorsal fin, to lure prey.

name: pichu
desc: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.

name: cleffa
desc: If the impact site of a meteorite is found, this POKéMON is certain to be within the immediate area.

name: igglybuff
desc: Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.

name: togepi
desc: It is considered to be a symbol of good luck. Its shell is said to be filled with happiness.

name: togetic
desc: Although it does not flap its wings very much, it can stay up in the air as it tags along after its trainer.

name: natu
desc: It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.

name: xatu
desc: Once it begins to meditate at sun­ rise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.

name: mareep
desc: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.

name: flaaffy
desc: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.

name: ampharos
desc: When it gets dark, the light from its bright, shiny tail can be seen from far away on the ocean's surface.

name: bellossom
desc: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: marill
desc: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in the water.

name: azumarill
desc: When it plays in water, it rolls up its elongated ears to prevent their insides from get­ ting wet.

name: sudowoodo
desc: If a tree branch shakes when there is no wind, it's a SUDOWOODO, not a tree. It hides from the rain.

name: politoed
desc: When it expands its throat to croak out a tune, nearby POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL gather immediately.

name: hoppip
desc: It can be carried away on even the gentlest breeze. It may even float all the way to the next town.

name: skiploom
desc: As soon as it rains, it closes its flower and hides in the shade of a tree to avoid getting wet.

name: jumpluff
desc: Even in the fierc­ est wind, it can control its fluff to make its way to any place in the world it wants.

name: aipom
desc: It lives atop tall trees. When leap­ ing from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.

name: sunkern
desc: It is very weak. Its only means of defense is to shake its leaves desperately at its attacker.

name: sunflora
desc: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this POKéMON's face become more vivid and lively.

name: yanma
desc: It can see in all directions without moving its big eyes, helping it spot attackers and food right away.

name: wooper
desc: A mucous membrane covers its body. Touching it barehanded will cause a shooting pain.

name: quagsire
desc: Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head on the river bottom as it swims but seems not to care.

name: espeon
desc: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent's next move.

name: umbreon
desc: On the night of a full moon, or when it gets excited, the ring patterns on its body glow yellow.

name: murkrow
desc: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. MURKROW and MEOWTH loot one another's stashes.

name: slowking
desc: Every time it ya­ wns, SHELLDER injects more poi­ son into it. The poison makes it more intelligent.

name: misdreavus
desc: It loves to watch people it's scar­ ed. It frightens them by screaming loudly or appear­ ing suddenly.

name: unown
desc: Because different types of UNOWN exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.

name: wobbuffet
desc: To keep its pitch- black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

name: girafarig
desc: When it is in danger, its tail uses some sort of mysterious powers to drive away the enemy.

name: pineco
desc: It spits out a fluid that it uses to glue tree bark to its body. The fluid hardens when it touches air.

name: forretress
desc: Usually found hanging on to a fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of its shell when it sees action.

name: dunsparce
desc: It hides deep inside caves where no light ever reaches it and remains virtually motionless there.

name: gligar
desc: It builds its nest on a steep cliff. When it is done gliding, it hops along the ground back to its nest.

name: steelix
desc: It is said that if an ONIX lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

name: snubbull
desc: In truth, it is a cowardly POKéMON. It growls eagerly in order to hide its fear from its opponent.

name: granbull
desc: It can make most any POKéMON run away simply by opening its mouth wide to reveal its big fangs.

name: qwilfish
desc: When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent's size.

name: scizor
desc: Its wings are not used for flying. They are flapped at high speed to adjust its body temperature.

name: shuckle
desc: The fluid secreted by its toes carves holes in rocks for nesting and can be mixed with BERRIES to make a drink.

name: heracross
desc: Usually docile, but if disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn.

name: sneasel
desc: Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from their nests and feasts on the eggs that are left behind.

name: teddiursa
desc: It always licks honey. Its palm tastes sweet because of all the honey it has absorbed.

name: ursaring
desc: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.

name: slugma
desc: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a con­ stant search for warm places.

name: magcargo
desc: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.

name: swinub
desc: It uses the tip of its nose to dig for food. Its nose is so tough that even frozen ground poses no problem.

name: piloswine
desc: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.

name: corsola
desc: The points on its head absorb nutrients from clean water. They cannot survive in polluted water.

name: remoraid
desc: To escape from an attacker, it may shoot water out of its mouth, then use that force to swim backward.

name: octillery
desc: Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.

name: delibird
desc: It always carries its food with it, wherever it goes. If attacked, it throws its food at the opponent.

name: mantine
desc: It swims along freely, eating things that swim into its mouth. Its whole body is very coarse.

name: skarmory
desc: The feathers that it sheds are very sharp. It is said that people once used the feathers as swords.

name: houndour
desc: Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes through the area to announce that this is its territory.

name: houndoom
desc: The pungent- smelling flame that shoots from its mouth results from toxins burn­ ing in its body.

name: kingdra
desc: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life forms can survive.

name: phanpy
desc: During the desert­ ed morning hours, it comes ashore where it deftly uses its trunk to take a shower.

name: donphan
desc: Because this POKéMON's skin is so tough, a normal attack won't even leave a scratch on it.

name: porygon2
desc: This manmade POKéMON evolved from the latest technology. It may have unprog­ rammed reactions.

name: stantler
desc: The round balls found on the fallen antlers can be ground into a powder that aids in sleeping.

name: smeargle
desc: The color of the mysterious fluid secreted from its tail is predeter­ mined for each SMEARGLE.

name: tyrogue
desc: To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong com­ petitive spirit.

name: hitmontop
desc: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent's timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.

name: smoochum
desc: The sensitivity of its lips develops most quickly. It uses them to try to identify unknown objects.

name: elekid
desc: Even in the most vicious storm, this POKéMON plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.

name: magby
desc: It naturally spits an 1100-degree flame. It is said when many appear, it heralds a volcanic eruption.

name: miltank
desc: If it has just had a baby, the milk it produces con­ tains much more nutrition than usual.

name: blissey
desc: Biting into one of the delicious eggs that BLISSEY provides will make everyone around smile with joy.

name: raikou
desc: This rough POKéMON stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.

name: entei
desc: This brawny POKéMON courses around the earth, spouting flames hotter than a volcano's magma.

name: suicune
desc: Said to be the reincarnation of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.

name: larvitar
desc: Born deep under­ ground, this POKéMON becomes a pupa after eating enough dirt to make a mountain.

name: pupitar
desc: It will not stay still, even while it's a pupa. It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.

name: tyranitar
desc: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and moun­ tains crumble.

name: lugia
desc: It has an incred­ ible ability to calm raging sto­ rms. It is said that LUGIA appears when storms start.

name: ho oh
desc: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted trainer by shining its bright rain­ bow-colored wings.

name: celebi
desc: Revered as a guardian of the forest, CELEBI appears wherever beautiful forests exist.

name: treecko
desc: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest’s trees.

name: grovyle
desc: This POKéMON adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no POKéMON can ever hope to catch a fleeing GROVYLE however fast they may be.

name: sceptile
desc: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This POKéMON carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.

name: torchic
desc: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A TORCHIC dislikes darkness because it can’t see its surroundings.

name: combusken
desc: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.

name: blaziken
desc: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.

name: mudkip
desc: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.

name: marshtomp
desc: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.

name: swampert
desc: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.

name: poochyena
desc: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.

name: mightyena
desc: MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.

name: zigzagoon
desc: Rubbing its nose against the ground, it always wanders about back and forth in search of something. It is distinguished by the zigzag footprints it leaves.

name: linoone
desc: It is exceedingly fast if it only has to run in a straight line. When it spots pond- dwelling prey underwater, it quickly leaps in and catches it with its sharp claws.

name: wurmple
desc: Using the spikes on its rear end,   WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.

name: silcoon
desc: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a WURMPLE. It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.

name: beautifly
desc: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.

name: cascoon
desc: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.

name: dustox
desc: It is a nocturnal POKéMON that flies from fields and mountains to the attraction of streetlights at night. It looses highly toxic powder from its wings.

name: lotad
desc: LOTAD is said to have dwelled on land before. However, this POKéMON is thought to have returned to water because the leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating atop the water.

name: lombre
desc: LOMBRE’s entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this POKéMON’s hands. LOMBRE is often mistaken for a human child.

name: ludicolo
desc: When it hears festive music, all the cells in its body become stimulated, and it begins moving in rhythm. It does not quail even when it faces a tough opponent.

name: seedot
desc: It hangs off branches and absorbs nutrients. When it finishes eating, its body becomes so heavy that it drops to the ground with a thump.

name: nuzleaf
desc: A forest-dwelling POKéMON that is skilled at climbing trees. Its long and pointed nose is its weak point. It loses power if the nose is gripped.

name: shiftry
desc: SHIFTRY’s large fans generate awesome gusts of wind at a speed close to 100 feet per second. The whipped-up wind blows anything away. This POKéMON chooses to live quietly deep in forests.

name: taillow
desc: Although it is small, it is very courageous. It will take on a larger SKARMORY on an equal footing. However, its will weakens if it becomes hungry.

name: swellow
desc: A SWELLOW dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.

name: wingull
desc: It makes its nest on a sheer cliff at the edge of the sea. It has trouble keeping its wings flapping in flight. Instead, it soars on updrafts.

name: pelipper
desc: PELIPPER is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON and eggs inside its massive bill. This POKéMON builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.

name: ralts
desc: A RALTS has the power to sense the emotions of people and POKéMON with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.

name: kirlia
desc: A KIRLIA has the psychic power to create  a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.

name: gardevoir
desc: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its TRAINER.

name: surskit
desc: If SURSKIT senses danger, it secretes a thick, sugary syrup from the tip of its head. There are some POKéMON that love eating this syrup.

name: masquerain
desc: It intimidates foes with the large eyelike patterns on its antennae. Because it can’t fly if its wings get wet, it shelters itself from rain under large trees and eaves.

name: shroomish
desc: It loves to eat damp, composted soil in forests. If you enter a forest after a long rain, you can see many SHROOMISH feasting on composted soil.

name: breloom
desc: The seeds ringing BRELOOM’s tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this POKéMON’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.

name: slakoth
desc: It sleeps virtually all day and night long. It doesn’t change its nest its entire life, but it sometimes travels great distances by swimming in rivers.

name: vigoroth
desc: It can’t keep still because its blood boils with energy. It runs through the fields and mountains all day to calm itself. If it doesn’t, it can’t sleep at night.

name: slaking
desc: Hordes of SLAKING gather around trees when fruits come into season. They wait around patiently for ripened fruits to fall out of the trees.

name: nincada
desc: It makes its nest at the roots of a mighty tree. Using its whiskerlike antennae, it probes its surroundings in the pitch-black darkness of soil.

name: ninjask
desc: Because it darts about vigorously at high speed, it is very difficult to see. Hearing its distinctive cries for too long induces a headache.

name: shedinja
desc: A peculiar POKéMON that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still. The inside of its body is hollow and utterly dark.

name: whismur
desc: Its cries equal a jet plane in volume. It inhales through its ear canals. Because of this system, it can cry continually without having to catch its breath.

name: loudred
desc: It positions the round speakers on its head to assail foes with ultrasonic waves at massive volume. It builds power by stomping the ground.

name: exploud
desc: It has sound-generating organs all over its body. It communicates with others by adjusting the tone and volume of the cries it emits.

name: makuhita
desc: It loves to toughen up its body above all else. If you hear quaking rumbles in a cave, it is the sound of MAKUHITA undertaking strenuous training.

name: hariyama
desc: HARIYAMA’s thick body may appear fat, but it is actually a hunk of solid muscle. If this POKéMON bears down and tightens all its muscles, its body becomes as hard as a rock.

name: azurill
desc: AZURILL’s tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this POKéMON needs to grow. AZURILL can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.

name: nosepass
desc: Its body emits a powerful magnetism. It feeds on prey that is pulled in by the force. Its magnetism is stronger in cold seasons.

name: skitty
desc: A SKITTY’s adorably cute behavior makes it highly popular. In battle, it makes its tail puff out. It threatens foes with a sharp growl.

name: delcatty
desc: Rather than keeping a permanent lair, it habitually seeks comfortable spots and sleeps there. It is nocturnal and becomes active at dusk.

name: sableye
desc: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food--raw gems. A SABLEYE lurks in darkness and is seen only rarely.

name: mawile
desc: Its giant jaws are actually steel horns that transformed. It fools foes into complacency with its adorable gestures, then chomps them with its huge jaws.

name: aron
desc: A POKéMON that is clad in steel armor. A new suit of armor is made when it evolves. The old, discarded armor is salvaged as metal for making iron products.

name: lairon
desc: When two LAIRON meet in the wild, they fight for territory by bashing into each other with their steel bodies. The sound of their collision carries for miles.

name: aggron
desc: Its iron horns grow longer a little at a time. They are used to determine the AGGRON’s age. The gouges in its armor are worn with pride as mementos from battles.

name: meditite
desc: MEDITITE heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this POKéMON’s training.

name: medicham
desc: Through crushingly harsh yoga training, it gained the power to foretell its foe’s actions. It battles with elegant, dance- like movement.

name: electrike
desc: It generates electricity using friction from the atmosphere. In seasons with especially arid air, its entire body blazes with violent showers of sparks.

name: manectric
desc: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, MANECTRIC were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.

name: plusle
desc: It has the trait of cheering on its fellow POKéMON. By shorting out the electricity it releases from its paws, it creates pom-poms for cheering.

name: minun
desc: At a meeting of POKéMON academics, it was announced that simultaneous exposure to electricity from a PLUSLE and MINUN will promote circulation and boost vitality.

name: volbeat
desc: With their taillights lit, VOLBEAT fly in a swarm, drawing geometric designs in the night sky. They move their nests if their pond water becomes dirty.

name: illumise
desc: ILLUMISE leads a flight of illuminated VOLBEAT to draw signs in the night sky. This POKéMON is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

name: roselia
desc: A ROSELIA that drinks nutritionally rich springwater blooms with lovely flowers. The fragrance of its flowers has the effect of making its foes careless.

name: gulpin
desc: This POKéMON’s stomach fluid can even digest scrap iron. In one gulp, it can swallow something that is as large as itself.

name: swalot
desc: SWALOT has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this POKéMON’s mouth.

name: carvanha
desc: CARVANHA attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious POKéMON, it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.

name: sharpedo
desc: The vicious and sly gangster of the sea. Its skin is specially textured to minimize drag in water. Its speed tops out at over 75 miles per hour.

name: wailmer
desc: While this POKéMON usually lives in the sea, it can survive on land, although not too long. It loses vitality if its body becomes dried out.

name: wailord
desc: It breathes through nostrils that it raises above the sea. By inhaling to its maximum capacity, a WAILORD can dive close to 10,000 feet beneath the waves.

name: numel
desc: A NUMEL stores boiling magma in the hump on its back. It is a hardy POKéMON that can transport a 220-pound load. It has served humans at work since long ago.

name: camerupt
desc: A POKéMON that lives in the crater of a volcano. Every 10 years, the volcanoes on its back erupt violently. Research is under way on the cause of eruption.

name: torkoal
desc: TORKOAL digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this POKéMON spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.

name: spoink
desc: A POKéMON that manipulates psychic power at will. It doesn’t stop bouncing even when it is asleep. It loves eating mushrooms that grow underground.

name: grumpig
desc: It stores power in the black pearls on its forehead. When it uses psychic power, it performs an odd dance step. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.

name: spinda
desc: No two SPINDA are said to have identical spot patterns on their hides. This POKéMON moves in a curious manner as if it is stumbling in dizziness. Its lurching movements can cause the opponent to become confused.

name: trapinch
desc: Its big jaws crunch through boulders. Because its head is so big, it has a hard time getting back upright if it tips over onto its back.

name: vibrava
desc: VIBRAVA’s wings have not yet completed the process of growing. Rather than flying long distances, they are more useful for generating ultrasonic waves by vibrating.

name: flygon
desc: The flapping of its wings sounds like singing. To prevent detection by enemies, it hides itself by flapping up a cloud of desert sand.

name: cacnea
desc: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower CACNEA grows. This POKéMON battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.

name: cacturne
desc: After spending thousands of years in harsh deserts, its blood transformed into the same substances as sand. It is nocturnal, so it hunts at night.

name: swablu
desc: A POKéMON that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, SWABLU flocks move closer to towns in the spring.

name: altaria
desc: ALTARIA sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This POKéMON catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

name: zangoose
desc: When it battles, it stands on its hind legs and attacks with its sharply clawed forelegs. Its fur bristles if it encounters any SEVIPER.

name: seviper
desc: SEVIPER and ZANGOOSE are eternal rivals. It counters a ZANGOOSE’s dazzling agility with its swordlike tail, which also oozes a horrible poison.

name: lunatone
desc: It becomes very active on the night of a full moon. This POKéMON was first discovered 40 years ago at the site of a meteor strike.

name: solrock
desc: Sunlight is the source of SOLROCK’s power. It is said to possess the ability to read the emotions of others. This POKéMON gives off intense heat while rotating its body.

name: barboach
desc: Its body is covered with a slimy film. The film acts as a barrier to prevent germs in muddy water from entering the BARBOACH’s body.

name: whiscash
desc: Mysteriously, it can foretell earthquakes. In the daytime, it sleeps in mud at the bottom of a pond. When it awakens, it continually feeds throughout the night.

name: corphish
desc: CORPHISH catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food - it will eat anything. This POKéMON has no trouble living in filthy water.

name: crawdaunt
desc: A brutish POKéMON that loves to battle. A veteran CRAWDAUNT that has prevailed in hundreds of battles has giant pincers marked with countless scars.

name: baltoy
desc: A BALTOY moves by spinning on its single foot. It has been depicted in murals  adorning the walls of a once-bustling city in an ancient age.

name: claydol
desc: A CLAYDOL sleeps while hovering in midair. Its arms are separate from its body. They are kept floating by the POKéMON’s manipulation of psychic power.

name: lileep
desc: It disguises itself as seaweed by making its tentacles sway. Unsuspecting prey that come too close are swallowed whole. It became extinct 100 million years ago.

name: cradily
desc: It drags its heavy body along the seafloor. It makes its nest in the shallows of warm seas. CRADILY can be seen on beaches when the tide goes out.

name: anorith
desc: It was resurrected from a fossil using the power of science. It swims by undulating the eight wings at its sides. They were feet that adapted to life in the sea.

name: armaldo
desc: ARMALDO usually lives on land. However, when it hunts for prey, it dives beneath the ocean. It swims around using its two large wings.

name: feebas
desc: FEEBAS live in ponds that are heavily infested with weeds. Because of its hopelessly shabby appearance, it seems as if few TRAINERS raise it.

name: milotic
desc: 也被称为最美的宝可梦， 一直给予许多艺术家灵感。

name: castform
desc: It alters its form depending on the weather. Changes in the climate such as the temperature and humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.

name: kecleon
desc: KECLEON alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.

name: shuppet
desc: This POKéMON roams about deep in the night seeking such negative emotions as grudges and envy. It retreats to its nest when the sun begins to rise.

name: banette
desc: An abandoned plush doll became this POKéMON. They are said to live in garbage dumps and wander about in search of the children that threw them away.

name: duskull
desc: A glare from its single scarlet eye makes even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear. It is a nocturnal POKéMON that roams about under the cloak of darkness.

name: dusclops
desc: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.

name: tropius
desc: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of TROPIUS. This POKéMON flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.

name: chimecho
desc: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.

name: absol
desc: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived POKéMON that has a life-span of 100 years.

name: wynaut
desc: A WYNAUT loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.

name: snorunt
desc: They tend to move about in groups of around five SNORUNT. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.

name: glalie
desc: A GLALIE has the power to instantaneously freeze moisture in the atmosphere. A dazzling cloud of diamondlike ice crystals forms around its body.

name: spheal
desc: It is completely covered with plushy fur. As a result, it never feels the cold even when it is rolling about on ice floes or diving in the sea.

name: sealeo
desc: SEALEO live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.

name: walrein
desc: WALREIN swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

name: clamperl
desc: A CLAMPERL slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.

name: huntail
desc: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.

name: gorebyss
desc: Although GOREBYSS is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this POKéMON inserts its thin mouth into the prey’s body and drains the prey of its body fluids.

name: relicanth
desc: A POKéMON that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.

name: luvdisc
desc: LUVDISC make the branches of CORSOLA their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a LUVDISC as a gift to express one’s feelings of love.

name: bagon
desc: BAGON harbors a never-ending dream of one day soaring high among the clouds. As if trying to dispel its frustration over its inability to fly, this POKéMON slams its hard head against huge rocks and shatters them into pebbles.

name: shelgon
desc: It hardly eats while it awaits evolution. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.

name: salamence
desc: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and rampages out of control.

name: beldum
desc: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout BELDUM’s body. This POKéMON communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.

name: metang
desc: The claws tipping its arms pack the destructive power to tear through thick iron sheets as if they were silk. It flies at over 60 miles per hour.

name: metagross
desc: METAGROSS has four brains that are joined by a complex neural network. As a result of integration, this POKéMON is smarter than a supercomputer.

name: regirock
desc: REGIROCK’s body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently, a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all unearthed from different locations.

name: regice
desc: Its entire body is made of Antarctic ice. After extensive studies, researchers believe the ice was formed during an ice age.

name: registeel
desc: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.

name: latias
desc: They make a small herd of only several members. They rarely make contact with people or other POKéMON. They disappear if they sense enemies.

name: latios
desc: Even in hiding, it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.

name: kyogre
desc: KYOGRE has appeared in mythology as the creator of the sea. After long years of feuding with GROUDON, it took to sleep at the bottom of the sea.

name: groudon
desc: GROUDON has long been described in  mythology as the POKéMON that raised lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.

name: rayquaza
desc: A POKéMON that flies endlessly in the ozone layer. It is said it would descend to the ground if KYOGRE and GROUDON were to fight.

name: jirachi
desc: JIRACHI is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.

name: deoxys normal
desc: A POKéMON that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.

name: turtwig
desc: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy TURTWIG, the shell should feel moist.

name: grotle
desc: Il sait d’instinct où trouver une source d’eau pure. Il y transporte d’autres Pokémon sur son dos.

name: torterra
desc: Some Pokémon are born on a TORTERRA’s back and spend their entire life there.

name: chimchar
desc: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.

name: monferno
desc: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

name: infernape
desc: It uses unique fighting moves with fire on its hands and feet. It will take on any opponent.

name: piplup
desc: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.

name: prinplup
desc: Because every PRINPLUP considers itself to be the most important, they can never form a group.

name: empoleon
desc: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.

name: starly
desc: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.

name: staravia
desc: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a STARAVIA cries noisily.

name: staraptor
desc: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.

name: bidoof
desc: A comparison revealed that BIDOOF’s front teeth grow at the same rate as RATTATA’s.

name: bibarel
desc: A river dammed by BIBAREL will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.

name: kricketot
desc: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

name: kricketune
desc: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.

name: shinx
desc: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: luxio
desc: It rests its forelegs on others to communicate with rhythmic electric pulses from its claws.

name: luxray
desc: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

name: budew
desc: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud is said to bloom when it feels the sun’s warm touch.

name: roserade
desc: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

name: cranidos
desc: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with head butts.

name: rampardos
desc: If two were to smash their heads together, their foot-thick skulls would keep them from fainting.

name: shieldon
desc: It is outstandingly armored. As a result, it can eat grass and berries without having to fight.

name: bastiodon
desc: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.

name: burmy
desc: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.

name: wormadam plant
desc: When evolving, its body takes in surrounding materials. As a result, there are many body variations.

name: mothim
desc: While it loves floral honey, it won’t gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from COMBEE.

name: combee
desc: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please VESPIQUEN.

name: vespiquen
desc: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.

name: pachirisu
desc: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: buizel
desc: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.

name: floatzel
desc: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.

name: cherubi
desc: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.

name: cherrim
desc: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.

name: shellos
desc: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.

name: gastrodon
desc: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.

name: ambipom
desc: Split into two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things, AMBIPOM rarely uses its hands.

name: drifloon
desc: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.”

name: drifblim
desc: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.

name: buneary
desc: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.

name: lopunny
desc: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

name: mismagius
desc: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.

name: honchkrow
desc: If one utters a deep cry, many MURKROW gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”

name: glameow
desc: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn’t fed.

name: purugly
desc: It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.

name: chingling
desc: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: stunky
desc: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: skuntank
desc: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

name: bronzor
desc: X-ray photos were taken to check its body structure. Nothing appeared, however.

name: bronzong
desc: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.

name: bonsly
desc: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

name: mime jr
desc: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.

name: happiny
desc: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others’ feet and cause them to stumble.

name: chatot
desc: Its tongue is just like a human’s. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.

name: spiritomb
desc: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

name: gible
desc: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.

name: gabite
desc: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: garchomp
desc: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

name: munchlax
desc: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.

name: riolu
desc: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: lucario
desc: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

name: hippopotas
desc: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around ten.

name: hippowdon
desc: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

name: skorupi
desc: As soon as the tail claws close, its needle tips secrete poison. It can survive a year without food.

name: drapion
desc: Possessing a sturdy build, it takes pride in its strength, taking down foes without using toxins.

name: croagunk
desc: It rarely fights fairly, but that is strictly to ensure survival. It is popular as a mascot.

name: toxicroak
desc: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.

name: carnivine
desc: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet- smelling drool and gulps them down.

name: finneon
desc: The way its two tail fins flutter while it swims has earned it the nickname “BEAUTIFLY of the Sea.”

name: lumineon
desc: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.

name: mantyke
desc: People organize tours to see this Pokémon frolic and skim the tops of waves with REMORAID.

name: snover
desc: Seemingly curious about people, they gather around footsteps they find on snowy mountains.

name: abomasnow
desc: They appear when the snow flowers bloom. When the petals fall, they retreat to places unknown again.

name: weavile
desc: Evolution made it even more devious. It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.

name: magnezone
desc: A group tried to use scientific means to make MAGNEZONE evolve, but their efforts ended in failure.

name: lickilicky
desc: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

name: rhyperior
desc: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening then expanding muscles instantly.

name: tangrowth
desc: Its arms are made of plants that bind themselves to things. They grow back right away if cut.

name: electivire
desc: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

name: magmortar
desc: When launching 3,600 degrees F fireballs, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.

name: togekiss
desc: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.

name: yanmega
desc: Its jaw power is incredible. It is adept at biting apart foes while flying by at high speed.

name: leafeon
desc: It basically does not fight. With cells similar to those of plants, it can perform photosynthesis.

name: glaceon
desc: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

name: gliscor
desc: If it succeeds in catching even a faint breeze properly, it can circle the globe without flapping once.

name: mamoswine
desc: A frozen one was dug up from soil dating back 10,000 years. It woke up to much amazement.

name: porygon z
desc: Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.

name: gallade
desc: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

name: probopass
desc: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

name: dusknoir
desc: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

name: froslass
desc: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degrees F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.

name: rotom
desc: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

name: uxie
desc: When UXIE flew, people gained the ability to solve problems. It was the birth of knowledge.

name: mesprit
desc: When MESPRIT flew, people learned the joy and sadness of living. It was the birth of emotions.

name: azelf
desc: When AZELF flew, people gained the determination to do things. It was the birth of willpower.

name: dialga
desc: A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh. It is said that time flows when DIALGA’s heart beats.

name: palkia
desc: A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh. It is said that space becomes more stable with PALKIA’s every breath.

name: heatran
desc: Its body is made of rugged steel. However, it is partially melted in spots because of its own heat.

name: regigigas
desc: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

name: giratina altered
desc: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

name: cresselia
desc: On nights around the quarter moon, the aurora from its tail extends and undulates beautifully.

name: phione
desc: A Pokémon that lives in warm seas. It inflates the flotation sac on its head to drift and search for food.

name: manaphy
desc: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: darkrai
desc: To protect itself, it afflicts those around it with nightmares. However, it means no harm.

name: shaymin land
desc: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

name: arceus
desc: It is said to have emerged from an egg in a place where there was nothing, then shaped the world.

name: victini
desc: Son corps produit une énergie sans limites qu’il peut partager avec ceux qu’il touche.
